title: Research Links for Watches on Website
snippet:
For this project, you will be given a list of watches by brand and model, and will be asked to get the links for the watch on various sites, by searching for the models on each site. You will need to grab the links for the watches from 6-7 sites.

Accuracy is key.

If you are interested, you will be asked to try out a couple to test on your ability to do this
